channel.title: [PI] Beastlypvp [PI] ReBourned!
channel.description:
okay so this Dev team is fully consisted on pk server it has many mini-games to chose from and here is what we currently got done: [u][b]Minigames[/b][/u] Pest Control: 99% Barrows: 99% Dueling: 50% Barbarian Assualt: 99% (95% credits to Davidi2, I fixed some glitches) Castle Wars: 99% (About 70% credits to Bulby, but I fixed many glitches) Fist of Guthix: Unstarted (Creds to that guy who gave me map data for the map data) Fight Pits: 99% (100% credits to TokkulScape) [u][b]Skills[/b][/u] Combat: 99% (Near perfect, credits to whoever made the combat) Range: 99% (Near perfect, credits to whoever made it) Mage: 99% (Near perfect, 5% credits to me for making delays on projectiles) Woodcutting: 99% (Near perfect, I fixed many glitches and added ents + nests) Mining: 99% (My favorite skill, near perfect, fixed many glitches + added breaks) Fishing: 70% (It's ok, barely did anything to it) Cooking: 99% (Near perfect, I added level requirements, and burning) Firemaking: 70% (Near perfect, except walk west is NOT clipped) Hunting: 10% (I didn't modify it, just clicking on birds and does animation and adds item) Construction: 10% (I didn't modify it, just commands to make new rooms) Summoning: 70% (You can summon, but no shards ect, I modified it so that summon npcs attack and you can attack them) Smithing: 70% (IDK) There is alot more coming!! [b]Now if you would like to join this project here is the positions we offer:[/b] Web designer (1) Programmers (2) Staff (3) Advert director (1) Beta testers (3) Graphic designers (2) Hoster (1) [u][b] Now if you wants to apply here is the fourm to do it:[/b][/u]
Name: Age: Position Wanted: Experience: Interests: Msn:
[font=arial black][size=14pt][u][b]My Msn is gipsey95@hotmail.com[/b][/u][/size][/font] here is alittle proof of devlopment!: [img]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/539/lolzjf.png[/img] [img]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/489/lolz8.png[/img] [img]http://img808.imageshack.us/img808/7309/lolz7.png[/img] [img]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/5093/lolz4.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Beastlypvp [PI] ReBourned!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“xVhincex, post:7, topic:381751”]God, when will you guys realize that you’re not gonna get FAR using Project Insanity.
Almost all Mini-Games + they have sources out there with GodWars already.
Try using a legit 500+ source and adding all these. That would be a change for once instead of seeing all these stupid
P.I advertisements.

I am mad.[/quote]
You speak the truth alright, I think Project-Insanity is going to have to be removed from the world.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Beastlypvp [PI] ReBourned!
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh pkerjosh
item.description:
@pkerjosh wrote:

okay so this Dev team is fully consisted on pk server it has many mini-games to chose from and here is what we currently got done:

Minigames
Pest Control: 99%
Barrows: 99%
Dueling: 50%
Barbarian Assualt: 99% (95% credits to Davidi2, I fixed some glitches)
Castle Wars: 99% (About 70% credits to Bulby, but I fixed many glitches)
Fist of Guthix: Unstarted (Creds to that guy who gave me map data for the map data)
Fight Pits: 99% (100% credits to TokkulScape)

Skills
Combat: 99% (Near perfect, credits to whoever made the combat)
Range: 99% (Near perfect, credits to whoever made it)
Mage: 99% (Near perfect, 5% credits to me for making delays on projectiles)
Woodcutting: 99% (Near perfect, I fixed many glitches and added ents + nests)
Mining: 99% (My favorite skill, near perfect, fixed many glitches + added breaks)
Fishing: 70% (It’s ok, barely did anything to it)
Cooking: 99% (Near perfect, I added level requirements, and burning)
Firemaking: 70% (Near perfect, except walk west is NOT clipped)
Hunting: 10% (I didn’t modify it, just clicking on birds and does animation and adds item)
Construction: 10% (I didn’t modify it, just commands to make new rooms)
Summoning: 70% (You can summon, but no shards ect, I modified it so that summon npcs attack and you can attack them)
Smithing: 70% (IDK)

There is alot more coming!!

Now if you would like to join this project here is the positions we offer:
Web designer (1)
Programmers (2)
Staff (3)
Advert director (1)
Beta testers (3)
Graphic designers (2)
Hoster (1)

Now if you wants to apply here is the fourm to do it:

Name: Age: Position Wanted: Experience: Interests: Msn:

[font=arial black][size=14pt]My Msn is gipsey95@hotmail.com[/size][/font]

here is alittle proof of devlopment!:
